verses.name: Colossians 4:1
verses.text: Masters, give unto your servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.

verses.name: Colossians 4:2
verses.text: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;

verses.name: Colossians 4:3
verses.text: Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:

verses.name: Colossians 4:4
verses.text: That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.

verses.name: Colossians 4:5
verses.text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.
